name: The Water Is Always Running (VR)
description:
+This software requires a virtual reality headset and a Leap Motion Controller+

The Water Is Always Running is a music-led, virtual reality experience about over-consumption.

Inspired by Fluxus events scores, vaporwave, and virtual reality training simulators; The Water is Always Running suggests to the user a simple task: wash the dishes... in the sky... to a soundtrack of warped and broken 80s pop music.

This work is the first in a series of music-led virtual reality experiences exploring the intersection of human-centered design and defamiliarization. This is an alpha version and I would greatly appreciate your feedback on the software. I'll be uploading more information to this page as development continues. If you have any feedback you can reach me here:
